title.bibl: Otthon, Nov. 22, 1935. "Fifty Years Old--Fifty Thousand Members!" Slogan of the Verhovay Aid Society to Aid in Attaining This Goal(Adv.)

div.bibl: Otthon, Nov. 22, 1935. "FIFTY YEARS OLD--FIFTY THOUSAND MEMBERS!" SLOGAN OF THE VERHOVAY AID SOCIETY TO AID IN ATTAINING THIS GOAL(Adv.)

body.p: "The Great Inheritance" a three act play will be presented from coast to coast. This play was written expressly for the fiftieth anniversary of the Verhovay by Arpod Tarnoczy. This prize winning play will be under the direction of Erno Kiraly with his Hungarian Actors Company Sunday, Nov. 24, at 8 P. M., at the De Paul Auditorium.
Admission one dollar, seventy five cents, and fifty cents.
Installation of new members during the third act.
All Verhovay members are urged to attend, also those who wish to become members.
